title: Albums of the Year 2013
body:
You’re probably sick of the self-aggrandisation and bombast of these lists, so, here’s a list.

Or something. I dunno. Just look at number one and get it over with, I’m sure you won’t even remember what #13 is.

**15) Dirty Projectors – Swing Lo Magellan**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/ddff3e4a-660x660.jpg "ddff3e4a")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/ddff3e4a.jpg)  

**14) Why? – Mumps etc.**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/WHY-660x660.jpg "WHY")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/WHY.jpg)

**13) Beach House – Bloom**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/f251d544-660x660.jpg "f251d544")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/f251d544.jpg)

**12) DIIV – Oshin**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/diivoshin14004-660x660.jpg "diivoshin14004")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/diivoshin14004.jpg)

**11) Sharon Van Etten – Tramp**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/SharonVanEtten_Tramp-660x660.jpg "jag201lpjacketOUTre")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/SharonVanEtten_Tramp.jpeg)

**10) Kendrick Lamar – Good kid, M.A.A.D City**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Kendrick_Lamar-Good_Kid_Mad_City_art.jpeg "Kendrick_Lamar-Good_Kid_Mad_City_art")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Kendrick_Lamar-Good_Kid_Mad_City_art.jpeg)

**9) Battles – Dross Glop**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/battles-dross-glop-660x660.jpg "battles-dross-glop")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/battles-dross-glop.jpg)

**8) The XX – Coexist**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/The-xx-Coexist.jpg "The-xx-Coexist")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/The-xx-Coexist.jpg)

**7) Chairlift – Something**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/19.-Chairlift-Something1-660x660.jpg "19.-Chairlift-Something1")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/19.-Chairlift-Something1.jpg)

**6) How To Dress Well – Total Loss**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/htdw-940x940-660x660.jpg "htdw-940x940")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/htdw-940x940.jpg)

**5) Frank Ocean – Channel ORANGE**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Frank-Ocean-channel-Orange-660x660.jpg "Frank-Ocean-channel-Orange")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Frank-Ocean-channel-Orange.jpeg)

**4) Grimes – Visions**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/4771c8e8-640x640.jpg "4771c8e8")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/4771c8e8.jpg)

**3) Purity Ring – Shrines**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Purity-pack-shot-660x660.jpg "Purity-pack-shot")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Purity-pack-shot.jpeg)

**2) Tame Impala – Lonism**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/36f82082.jpeg "36f82082")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/36f82082.jpeg)

**1) Chromatics – Kill For Love**

[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Chromatics-Kill-for-Love-1024x1024-660x660.jpg "Chromatics-Kill-for-Love-1024x1024")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/Chromatics-Kill-for-Love-1024x1024.jpg)

excerpt.full: You’re probably sick of the self-aggrandisation and bombast of these lists, so, here’s a list. Or something. I dunno. Just look at number one and get it over with, I’m sure you won’t even remember what #13 is. 15) Dirty Projectors – Swing Lo Magellan 14) Why? – Mumps etc. 13) Beach House – Bloom \[…\]
